label: Cell Ranger
info: Simple secondary analysis of the gene-barcode matrix output of Cell Ranger
instructions:
- Specify the Cell Ranger data directory
 - Specify the desired workflow and parameters
 - Click [ Run ]

categories.label: Input
categories.info: Cell Ranger pipeline output directory. It should contain another directory named "outs"

visr.param.pipestance_path.label: Cell Ranger data directory
visr.param.pipestance_path.info: Cell Ranger pipeline output directory. It should contain another directory named "outs"

categories.label: Preliminary Visualization
categories.info: Visualization of pre-computed results under a 2D projection

visr.param.precomputed_visualization.label: Visualization
item-labels: t-SNE colored by total UMI count
t-SNE colored by signatures of gene markers

visr.param.vis_umi_min_value.label: min value
visr.param.vis_umi_min_value.info: min saturate value on the color bar

visr.param.vis_umi_max_value.label: max value
visr.param.vis_umi_max_value.info: max saturate value on the color bar

visr.param.vis_min_value.label: min value
visr.param.vis_min_value.info: min saturate value on the color bar

visr.param.vis_max_value.label: max value
visr.param.vis_max_value.info: max saturate value on the color bar

categories.label: Export precomputed analysis results
categories.info: The analysis table of cells together with precomputed dimensionality reduction and clustering results.

visr.param.analysis_table.label: Name for table to output barcodes to
visr.param.analysis_table.info: Name of the output table to appear in VisR

visr.param.include_umi_counts.label: Include total UMI counts
visr.param.include_umi_counts.info: Include a column with total number of UMIs for each cell in the output table?

visr.param.include_tsne.label: Include t-SNE projection
visr.param.include_tsne.info: Include t-SNE projections (2 columns) in the output table?

visr.param.include_pca.label: Include PCA projection
visr.param.include_pca.info: Include PCA projections in the output table (10 columns: PCA.1 to PCA.10)?

visr.param.include_kmeans.label: Include k-means results
visr.param.include_kmeans.info: Include precomputed kmeans clusterings in the output table (9 columns: kmeans.2 to kmeans.10)?

visr.param.include_genecounts.label: Include counts for genes
visr.param.include_genecounts.info: Include gene counts for the genes specified below.

visr.param.analysis_table_gene_list.label: Gene list to export (comma separated)
visr.param.analysis_table_gene_list.info: Comma separated list of genes to export to the output table

categories.label: Differential expression analysis
categories.info: The analysis table of genes together with the differential expression analysis results

visr.param.cluster_heatmap_n_genes.label: number of genes in heatmap
visr.param.cluster_heatmap_n_genes.info: Number of genes to include in the heatmap

visr.param.cluster_heatmap_min.label: heatmap min value
visr.param.cluster_heatmap_min.info: min saturate value on the color bar

visr.param.cluster_heatmap_max.label: heatmap max value
visr.param.cluster_heatmap_max.info: max saturate value on the color bar

visr.param.de_analysis_table.label: Output DE Genes to table
visr.param.de_analysis_table.info: Name of the genes output table to appear in VisR

visr.param.de_only_significant.label: Export significant genes only
visr.param.de_only_significant.info: Only export genes that were significant in atleast one of the clusters. Uncheck to export all genes.

visr.param.de_include_sum_a.label: Include sum of inside cluster values

visr.param.de_include_sum_b.label: Include sum of outside cluster values
